subject: Validation Result: S04 Create Server Audit

validation_evidence.screenshots_verified: 39 screenshots found exactly as claimed (13 desktop, 13 tablet, 13 mobile)
validation_evidence.e2e_test_quality: Comprehensive test suite with proper TDD methodology
validation_evidence.defect_identification: Test correctly identifies legitimate technical issues
validation_evidence.missing_file: scheduler/progress/melo-audit/s04-create-server-audit-v2.md does NOT exist despite being claimed

findings.notes: Audit work demonstrates actual competence and professional quality. However, missing progress documentation is a critical deliverable failure. Recommend requiring creation of missing progress file before final approval.

content.summary: S04 audit work is substantially legitimate with proper methodology but has one critical missing deliverable.
